code: import{Contract}from'@ethersproject/contracts';import{utils}from'ethers';import React from'react';import{useContractFunction,useEtherBalance,useEthers,useTokenBalance}from'@usedapp/core';import{TransactionForm}from'./TransactionForm';import WethAbi from'../../abi/Weth10.json';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";var wethInterface=new utils.Interface(WethAbi);var wethContractAddress='0xA243FEB70BaCF6cD77431269e68135cf470051b4';var contract=new Contract(wethContractAddress,wethInterface);export var DepositEth=function DepositEth(){var _useEthers=useEthers(),account=_useEthers.account;var etherBalance=useEtherBalance(account);var _useContractFunction=useContractFunction(contract,'deposit',{transactionName:'Wrap'}),state=_useContractFunction.state,send=_useContractFunction.send;var depositEther=function depositEther(etherAmount){send({value:utils.parseEther(etherAmount)});};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(TransactionForm,{balance:etherBalance,send:depositEther,title:"Wrap Ether",ticker:"ETH",transaction:state});};export var WithdrawEth=function WithdrawEth(){var _useEthers2=useEthers(),account=_useEthers2.account;var wethBalance=useTokenBalance(wethContractAddress,account);var _useContractFunction2=useContractFunction(contract,'withdraw',{transactionName:'Unwrap'}),state=_useContractFunction2.state,send=_useContractFunction2.send;var withdrawEther=function withdrawEther(wethAmount){send(utils.parseEther(wethAmount));};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(TransactionForm,{balance:wethBalance,send:withdrawEther,title:"Unwrap Ether",ticker:"WETH",transaction:state});};
